short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your content on X/Twitter from shameless thieves!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find out who's posting your content without your permission.

Tweet Patrol is a community-powered tool designed to combat image theft on X (formerly Twitter).

Creators can register their content on the platform with ease. Custom buttons are injected directly onto a creator's image posts, enabling simple and straightforward content registration.

As a community-powered tool, Tweet Patrol passively identifies, flags, and processes unauthorized reposts whenever another extension user encounters them. If a post is flagged as stolen, a popup is displayed above it, including a link to the original tweet when available.

Have questions? Reach out via email or on X: https://x.com/arandomboiisme
